email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear John,

We are looking to ship 150,000MT of iron ore from Port Hedland to Qingdao. Could you provide your best freight rate and available vessel for this shipment?

Best regards,
Sarah Connor

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN MAJESTY (DWT: 180,000, LOA: 300m) for this shipment. The starting freight rate is USD 18.50 per MT on a CFR basis. Laycan is 20-25 October. Let me know your thoughts.

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thanks for the quote. USD 18.50 seems a bit high. Can you do better? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

I can offer USD 18.00 per MT. Demurrage rate is USD 25,000 per day. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

USD 18.00 is better. Can we push it to USD 17.75? Also, can we adjust the laycan to 22-27 October?

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

USD 17.75 is possible. Laycan adjusted to 22-27 October. Please confirm.

Best regards,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Port Hedland to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Confirmed. Please send the summary of terms.

Best regards,
Sarah
